idea: THE PROMOTERS WITH THEIR EDUCATIONAL EXPERIENCE FELT THE NEED FOR A LEARNING CENTRE WITH HIGHER, BETTER AND MORE SCIENTIFIC CURRICULUM TO GUIDE THE STUDENTS. THE PROMOTERS BELIEVE THAT THROUGH THERE GUIDANCE & LEARNING TECHNIQUES THERE EMPLOYEE & STUDENTS GETS ENTERPRENUAR SKILL & TRAINING THEY FEEL THAT WHATEVER THEY GET BECAUSE, OF THERE PARENTS, TEACHERS AND COUNTRY ONCE THEY UNDERSTAND THAT THERE RESPOSIBILY TOWARDS THERE PARENTS, SOCIETY, STATE AND COUNTRY THEY NEVER BE MISGUIDED. WE BELIEVE MOST OF THE DEVELOPED COUNTRY WHY THERE PEOPLE ARE HAPPY BECAUSE THERE PEOPLE ARE EDUCATED, NOT ONLY EDUCATED BUT IS MATURED AND FEEL THAT WHATEVER THEY ARE IN THIS WORLD BECAUSE OF THERE COUNTRY. LEARNING IS A PROCESS WHICH IS NEVER END TILL WE DIE. WE ARE LEARNING EVERY DAY WHETHER A SMALL CHILD OR OLDER PEOPLE. IN TODAYS WORLD WHAT THE PARENTS THINKING ABOUT THERE CHILD, MOST OF US FEEL THAT HE MUST NOT FACE PROBLEM WHICH WE WERE FACED IN THE PAST THAT MEANS HE BECOME A BETTER PERSON THAN WE ARE. MOST OF US IN INDIA PARENTS ARE FORCING THERE CHILD TO LEARN THEY DO NOT KNOW IN WHICH AREA THEY ARE STRONG AND WHICH AREA THEY ARE WEAK. WE ARE LOOKING STUDENTS AS A NATIONAL WEALTH AND WE ARE MAKE THEM AFTER COMPLETION OF COURSE WEALTHY FROM HEALTH AND MIND TO SERVE THE COUNTRY WITH HONESTY AND CONTRIBUTE THERE SERVICE TO COUNTRY PROSPERITY AND IN FUTURE ALSO IF WE WILL HELP HIM WHENEVER THEY NEED GUIDANCE. WE ARE HERE TO SERVE NATION FIRST, BUILDING THAT KIND OF WEALTH OF WHO NOT ONLY SERVE NATION BUT ALSO SERVE THERE PEOPLE.
name: VASUDEVKUTUMBH EDUCATION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We AJAYA SOLUTION PVT LTD come up with mobile app / platform by the brand name RupeeMax.
RupeeMax is a convenient online loan app without mortgages. It focuses on helping young white-collar workers and blue-collar workers to meet their urgent needs of petty loan in their daily life with providing a smart loan which is range from 5,000 Rupees to 10,000 Rupees and 15 days’ loan tenure.
RupeeMax adopts the online way, which eliminates the tedious processes and applications of the traditional financial services.It is aiming to provide a new mode of borrowing with simple, convenient, flexible and fast.
RupeeMax is only a service provider and aggregating mobile app / platform and does not do any type of lending.
name: AJAYA SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

idea:
OGPEX GEOSCIENCE(OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED, an independent oil and gas exploration, development and business development service provider.

Vision & Mission

Carry out exploration, development and production of hydrocarbon work in synergetic approach by integrating geology and geo-scientific data with due diligence.

i) Application of cutting edge technology in the ever widening frontiers of Exploration and Exploitation of Hydrocarbons in cost effective manner.

ii) Innovation of new solutions to resolve the challenging problems in seismic API, Geology, drilling, testing, production and evacuation of hydrocarbon to reduce CAPEX and OPEX drastically.

iii) Convert liabilities to assets in the present oil and gas market scenarios.

iv)Research and development work on heterogeneity of the reservoirs to address the challenging problem for prediction of porosity, permeability, well deliverability and production rate within the reservoir with precision.
name: OGPEX GEOSCIENCE (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED
